title: Ent Center for the Arts at UCCS Fund
description: To support operations, programs, functions, and maintenance for the Ent Center for the Arts and University of Colorado Colorado Springs.
marketingContent: The Ent Center supports arts, culture and community for UCCS and the Pikes Peak region. Its professional arts programs include the Artist Series, UCCS Galleries of Contemporary Art (GOCA) and Theatreworks.
